channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Polymarket says it is returning to the U.S. ‘in the near future’
item.description: Prediction market hasn't operated here since 2022.

item.title: Coke and Pepsi both unveil new sodas made with cane sugar, but neither are what you’d expect
item.description: Changes are coming to the soda aisle.

item.title: A quarter of Gen X who’ve been laid off in the last decade haven’t found another job since—and 11% have taken pay cuts to escape unemployment
item.description: Just as financial pressure peaks, many Gen Xers are finding themselves overlooked, underpaid, and edged out.

item.title: He won a victory for Tesla’s European owners—now one Elon Musk fan is pushing for FSD to finally come to Sweden
item.description: Tesla owner Alexander Kristensen has is mounting an unofficial campaign to bring Tesla's supervised self-driving technology to the streets of Stockhol...

item.title: A void of Medicaid infrastructure in Trump’s ‘One Big, Beautiful Bill’ may result in a customer service nightmare, warn Washington insiders
item.description: New Medicaid rules will require 18.5 million people to prove they meet the requirements every year—and that portends a bureaucratic nightmare.

item.title: Yeti’s stock has been hot, and this ‘viral’ tote could be why
AstraZeneca's $50 bln U.S. investment plan includes previously announced moves
General Motors tops profit expectations but warns of more tariff pain
U.K. government approves new $51 billion Sizewell C nuclear power plant
Powell doesn't comment on economy or interest rates in brief remarks
